name: co-lab
description: A web-based virtual workspace supporting up to 20 concurrent users with spatial audio/video zones

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "server,client" -c "blue,green" "bun run dev:server" "sleep 2 && bun run dev:client"
scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd client && bun install && cd ../server && bun install
